content:
I am a senior actuarial analyst at Hiscox. My current role is reserving focused, primarily within US liability classes of business. Outside of this role, I am interested in software development with a work-related focus on the capabilities of R.
This website is not associated with Hiscox and as such all views and opinions expressed are my own and do not reflect those of my employer.
